imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear

Class Shear

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.Mapping
      • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.LinearMapping
        • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.ProjectiveMapping
          • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.AffineMapping
            • imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.linear.Shear
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JacobianSupport, Cloneable

    public class Shear
extends AffineMapping
    This class represents a 2D shear transformation (as a special case of affine transformation).
